response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, reflecting years of innovation and dedication by our team. We believe its true worth exceeds $1,000,000, making it an unparalleled investment for those seeking unparalleled excellence.

Considering its unique features and capabilities, we are offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This is an opportunity not only to acquire a premium asset but also to be part of a select group of individuals who appreciate and utilize such extraordinary creations.

Please let us know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions regarding the product. We look forward to the possibility of serving you with this outstanding offering.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
